rules_text:
Atavistic {5}{C}{R} [i](You may cast this spell as a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature for {5}{C}{R}.)[/i]
Whenever Preternatural Spawner attacks, create X Scion tokens, where X is half its power, rounded down. [i](A Scion is a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”)[/i]
